cmp: 未 (1-3 p.m./8th earthly branch/not yet/did not/have not/not)
巴 ((suff. for certain nouns)/to hope/to wish/Palestinian, Palestine (abbrev.)/Pakistan (abbrev.)/Pascal (unit of pressure))

exm.mng: lit. to strike with a muck-rake (idiom), cf Pigsy 豬八戒|猪八戒 in Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记; fig. to counter-attack, to make bogus accusations (against one's victim)
to harrow, to break the ground with a hoe
The Nine-Toothed Rake (weapon of Zhu Bajie 豬八戒|猪八戒[Zhu1 Ba1 jie4])
(dialect) henpecked, to be under one's wife's thumb
